remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓冲区是内存中用于缓存数据的字节块，从而减少了对操作系统的调用次数。A buffer is a block of bytes in memory used to cache data, thereby reducing the number of calls to the operating system. 缓冲区提高读写性能。Buffers improve read and write performance. 缓冲区可用于读取或写入，但不能同时使用这两种方法。A buffer can be used for either reading or writing, but never both simultaneously. `BufferedStream` 的 和 方法自动维护缓冲区。The and methods of `BufferedStream` automatically maintain the buffer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. `BufferedStream` 可以围绕特定类型的流编写。`BufferedStream` can be composed around certain types of streams. 它提供对基础数据源或存储库的字节的读写实现。It provides implementations for reading and writing bytes to an underlying data source or repository. 使用 和 来读取和写入其他数据类型。Use and for reading and writing other data types. `BufferedStream` 旨在防止缓冲区在不需要缓冲区时减慢输入和输出。`BufferedStream` is designed to prevent the buffer from slowing down input and output when the buffer is not needed. 如果始终对大于内部缓冲区大小的大小进行读取和写入，则 `BufferedStream` 甚至可能不会分配内部缓冲区。If you always read and write for sizes greater than the internal buffer size, then `BufferedStream` might not even allocate the internal buffer. `BufferedStream` 还会在共享缓冲区中缓冲读取和写入。`BufferedStream` also buffers reads and writes in a shared buffer. 假设您几乎总是要执行一系列的读或写操作，但这两个读取或写入操作很少发生更改。It is assumed that you will almost always be doing a series of reads or writes, but rarely alternate between the two of them. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对 `NetworkStream` 类使用 `BufferedStream` 类以提高某些 i/o 操作的性能。The following code examples show how to use the `BufferedStream` class over the `NetworkStream` class to increase the performance of certain I/O operations. 启动客户端之前，在远程计算机上启动服务器。Start the server on a remote computer before starting the client. 启动客户端时，请将远程计算机名称指定为命令行参数。Specify the remote computer name as a command-line argument when starting the client. 改变 `dataArraySize` 和 `streamBufferSize` 常量，以查看它们对性能的影响。Vary the `dataArraySize` and `streamBufferSize` constants to view their effect on performance. 第一个示例显示了在客户端上运行的代码，第二个示例显示了在服务器上运行的代码。The first example shows the code that runs on the client, and the second example shows the code that runs on the server. **示例1：在客户端上运行的代码****Example 1: Code that runs on the client** [!code-cpp[System.IO.BufferedStream1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream1/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BufferedStream1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream1/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BufferedStream1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream1/VB/client.vb#1)] **示例2：在服务器上运行的代码****Example 2: Code that runs on the server** [!code-cpp[System.IO.BufferedStream2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream2/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BufferedStream2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream2/CS/server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BufferedStream2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream2/VB/server.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `CopyToAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `CopyToAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 从当前流中的当前位置开始复制。Copying begins at the current position in the current stream.
